name: ZODIAC MALL BALL
description:
OMEGAMILK SHOPPING DISTRICT, 2217

You're the last surviving pin collectors. The cutest bladekids.

In a mysterious forgotten mall... 
you compete for the rarest raddest pins.

But the Zodiac Mall Gods are jealous gods. 
Appease them to keep the mall open

Hey when a TOKEN appears, GET IT !
FEED IT to a MALL GOD they'll be psyched !
First to 3 POINTS wins eternal favor and mercy !

Keep your pin game up tho

-=-=--=-=-=-

CONTROLS

Zodiac Mall Ball supports up to 4 gamepads for radical local multiplayer action! Optional keyboard controls are also provided for players 1 and 2

GAMEPAD
Move - Left Stick
Left Trigger - Boost
X (Dualshock)/A (Xbox) - Jump, Select in Menus
Circle (Dualshock)/ B (Xbox) - Cancel in Menus

KEYBOARD
Player 1:
W/A/S/D - Move 
F - Jump
G - Boost 
Spacebar - Select in Menus 
Backspace - Cancel in Menus

Player 2:
Arrow Keys - Move
Period: Jump
Comma: Boost 

CREDITS 

Teddy Dief (design + programming)

Ethan Redd (design + 3d art) 

Jenny Jiao Hsia (design + 2d art) 

Akash Thakkar (music + sfx) 

Created for Drawfee Game Jam
